clientSide.stubs

Class BarStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientSide.stubs.BarStub

  • public class BarStub
extends java.lang.Object
    Stub to the Bar. It instantiates a remote reference to the Bar. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
